user.title: Connect to Home Assistant Time Machine
user.description: Enter the URL of your Home Assistant Time Machine addon. If you installed it as an addon, the default URL will work automatically.

data_description.url: The base URL of the Time Machine addon (e.g. http://homeassistant-time-machine:54000)
data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the addon for status updates (10–3600 seconds)

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Time Machine. Check that the addon is running and the URL is correct.
error.timeout_connect: Connection to Time Machine timed out. Check that the addon is running.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Check the logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This Time Machine instance is already configured.
